name: Smoker
text: [DON!! x1] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -1 to their cost during this turn. Then, if there is a Character with a cost of 0 in play, this Leader gains +1000 Power during this turn.
